00007 void initializeIdeHardDrive(unsigned int BAR0, unsigned int BAR1, unsigned int BAR2, unsigned int BAR3)
00008 {
00009         printf("Initializing hard drive 0x%x 0x%x 0x%x 0x%x\n", BAR0, BAR1, BAR2, BAR3);
00010 
00011         disk_device dev;
00012         memset(&dev, 0, sizeof(disk_device));
00013 
00014         dev.BAR0 = BAR0;
00015         dev.BAR1 = BAR1;
00016 
00017         dev.BAR2 = BAR2;
00018         dev.BAR3 = BAR3;
00019 
00020         dev.disk = 0;
00021 
00022         ideDriveOutputDiskType(dev);
00023 
00024         if (ideDetectDeviceType(dev) != T_UNKNOWN)
00025         {
00026                 //Its it not unknown then use it
00027                 addToHddFs(dev);
00028         }
00029 }

00032 void ideDriveOutputDiskType(disk_device dev)
00033 {
00034         printf("Checking master connect\n");
00035         dev.disk = 0;
00036 
00037         uint8 device_type = ideDetectDeviceType(dev);
00038 
00039         printf("Master device type: ");
00040 
00041         switch (device_type)
00042         {
00043                 case T_PATAPI:
00044                         printf("PATAPI\n");
00045                         break;
00046                 case T_SATAPI:
00047                         printf("SATAPI\n");
00048                         break;
00049                 case T_SATA:
00050                         printf("SATA\n");
00051                         break;
00052                 case T_PATA:
00053                         printf("PATA\n");
00054                         break;
00055                 case T_UNKNOWN: {
00056                         printf("UNKNOWN\n");            
00057                         break;
00058                 }
00059         }
00060 
00061 
00062         if (device_type == T_UNKNOWN)
00063         {
00064                 printf("Master device unknown. Either non-existant or incompatable hardware\n");
00065         }
00066 
00067         printf("Checking slave connect\n");
00068 
00069         dev.disk = 1;
00070 
00071         device_type = ideDetectDeviceType(dev);
00072 
00073         printf("Slave device type: ");
00074 
00075         switch (device_type)
00076         {
00077                 case T_PATAPI:
00078                 {
00079                         printf("PATAPI\n");
00080                         break;
00081                 }
00082                 case T_SATAPI:
00083                 {
00084                         printf("SATAPI\n");
00085                         break;
00086                 }
00087                 case T_SATA:
00088                 {
00089                         printf("SATA\n");
00090                         break;
00091                 }
00092                 case T_PATA:
00093                 {
00094                         printf("PATA\n");
00095                         break;
00096                 }
00097                 case T_UNKNOWN: 
00098                 {
00099                         printf("UNKNOWN\n");                    
00100                         break;
00101                 }
00102         }
00103 
00104         if (device_type == T_UNKNOWN)
00105         {
00106                 printf("Slave device unknown. Either non-existant or incompatable hardware\n");
00107         }
00108 }

00110 unsigned char ideWaitBusy(disk_device dev, unsigned int timeout)
00111 {
00112         uint8 rb;
00113         unsigned int timeout_timer = 0;
00114 
00115         for (;;) 
00116         {
00117                 timeout_timer++;
00118                 if (timeout_timer > RESET_TIMEOUT) { /* Timed out, return 0 *FAIL* */ return 0; }
00119 
00120                 rb = inb(dev.BAR1 + CTRL_PORT);
00121                 uint8 db = rb & 0x80;
00122 
00123                 if (db == 0) //BSY Clear
00124                 {
00125                         break;
00126                 }
00127         }
00128 
00129         return 1;
00130 }
00131 
00132 //Returns 0 if fine
00133 //Returns 1 if time out
00134 unsigned char ideSoftReset(disk_device dev)
00135 {
00136         uint8 rb = inb(dev.BAR1 + CTRL_PORT);
00137         
00138         outb(dev.BAR1 + CTRL_PORT, 4);
00139         outb(dev.BAR1 + CTRL_PORT, 0);
00140 
00141         /* Account for delay */
00142         inb(dev.BAR1 + CTRL_PORT);
00143         inb(dev.BAR1 + CTRL_PORT);
00144         inb(dev.BAR1 + CTRL_PORT);
00145         inb(dev.BAR1 + CTRL_PORT);
00146 
00147         if (ideWaitBusy(dev, RESET_TIMEOUT) == 0)
00148         {
00149                 printf("HDD SWRESET TIMEOUT PORT 0x%x 0x%x\n", dev.BAR0, dev.BAR1 + CTRL_PORT);
00150                 return 1;
00151         }
00152 
00153         return 0;
00154 }
00155 
00156 void ideSelectDevice(disk_device dev)
00157 {
00158         if (ideSoftReset(dev) == 1) return;
00159         outb(dev.BAR0 + REG_DEVSEL, 0xA0 | dev.disk << 4);
00160         inb(dev.BAR1 + CTRL_PORT);
00161         inb(dev.BAR1 + CTRL_PORT);
00162         inb(dev.BAR1 + CTRL_PORT);
00163         inb(dev.BAR1 + CTRL_PORT);
00164         inb(dev.BAR1 + CTRL_PORT);
00165         ideWaitBusy(dev, RESET_TIMEOUT);
00166 }
00167 
00168 unsigned char ideDetectDeviceType(disk_device dev)
00169 {
00170 
00171         if (ideSoftReset(dev) == 1)
00172         {
00173                 return T_UNKNOWN;
00174         }
00175 
00176         ideSelectDevice(dev);
00177 
00178         uint8 cl = inb(dev.BAR0 + REG_CYCLE_LO);
00179         uint8 ch = inb(dev.BAR0 + REG_CYCLE_HI);
00180 
00181         if (cl==0x14 && ch==0xEB) return T_PATAPI;
00182         if (cl==0x69 && ch==0x96) return T_SATAPI;
00183         if (cl==0 && ch == 0) return T_PATA;
00184         if (cl==0x3c && ch==0xc3) return T_SATA;
00185 
00186         return T_UNKNOWN;
00187 }
